resources.string: Pay advance now for immediate confirmation.

GetMeCab.com is an aggregator and seller of cab rental inventory online. 

We strive to provide high quality, affordable cab service with utmost transparency in terms of pricing and service delivery. We have a network of quality checked car rental partners across India which help us provide all kind of car rental services to our customers. 
We currently have our services in Delhi-NCR, Mumbai, Bangalore, Hyderabad and Jaipur and we will soon be expanding to other cities in India as well. We serve for following 

Outstation Round Trip car rental services 
Outstation OneWay car rental services 
Airport transfer services 
Intracity (local) car packages 

About the Team: 
GetMeCab.com is run by IIT-IIM graduates with vast experience in travel e-commerce domain. We are a group of passionate and determined professionals who wish to create an excellent taxi buying experience for you by leveraging cutting edge technology. Nothing excites us more than satisfaction of our users.
